- Cough and sneezing that have been persistent since last night
- Rhinorrhea (runny nose) that developed gradually over the past two days
- Mild otalgia (ear pain) on the right side that came on this morning
THESE SYMPTOMS CAME INTO FRUITION:

I also woke up this morning with a sore ear on the right side, which is a bit uncomfortable. I don’t have any trouble breathing but I feel pretty tired and a little irritable. My parents said I’ve been more restless and kept rubbing my ear since this morning.
